channel.title: [Looking For] Strong, Creative, Mature Server
channel.description:
Hi, I'm Mike and I'm 16 years of age.
I'm currently looking for a Strong, Creative, Mature server that's willing to take the following:
Administrator (all around administrative work from instructions from a higher rank or just a suggestion from a lower rank) Community Management (ideally dealing with Ban/Mute(IP) unfair gameplay issues) Moderator (in-game moderator, keeping things clean) Forum Moderator (forums moderator, keeping things clean and solid)
If you are interested, I use skype and I am on skype everyday.
Please, feel free to contact me and we can discuss something out.
I do also have a forums if you are wishing to start a new server.
*Note* I'm not a good coder, I generally am a friendly person that's open minded.
Skype= Mikemikemike194 Forums (that I created) = RS-Legacy.Tk
Thanks. :)
(Edit) I am open to all offers and will review them thoroughly.

item.title: [Looking For] Strong, Creative, Mature Server
item.dc:creator: @Coder_Eddie Coder Eddie
item.description:
@Coder_Eddie wrote:

lol like how you use words like “mature” but more info and prictures?,good luck

Read full topic

item.title: [Looking For] Strong, Creative, Mature Server
item.dc:creator: @Mike194 Mike194
item.description:
@Mike194 wrote:

Oh heavens no. I don’t have the time to do all that work and I’m not a good coder.

Yes, I am working my way around the topics reading thoroughly for any of the following I am currently searching for.

Read full topic

item.title: [Looking For] Strong, Creative, Mature Server
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

[quote=“Mike194, post:3, topic:414393”]Well, I’m open to all servers as mentioned before, only issue is I do not have a server staff team, but I am looking for one that’s willing to go far in a private server. As the domain, I only use Dot.Tk just for the beginning of things, as it’s a lot easier to save you money until you start gaining players and have a active community.

If you would like to start one, that would be amazing, like I mentioned before, I’m not a coder, but I’m swell with players and (you’ve probably heard this millions of times) active. ;)[/quote]Oh… I thought you were making a server xD Uhh, you should probably just go around looking for teams who need you.

Read full topic

item.title: [Looking For] Strong, Creative, Mature Server
item.dc:creator: @Mike194 Mike194
item.description:
@Mike194 wrote:

Well, I’m open to all servers as mentioned before, only issue is I do not have a server staff team, but I am looking for one that’s willing to go far in a private server. As the domain, I only use Dot.Tk just for the beginning of things, as it’s a lot easier to save you money until you start gaining players and have a active community.

If you would like to start one, that would be amazing, like I mentioned before, I’m not a coder, but I’m swell with players and (you’ve probably heard this millions of times) active.

Read full topic

item.title: [Looking For] Strong, Creative, Mature Server
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

[code]Player whose looking to have fun:
“Hey bitches! I can to play RS-Legacy!”

‘Mature’ Administrator:
“::ipban Player whose looking to have fun”[/code]

No one likes “Mature” servers, cause it ends up that admins are usually like that… Just my view of things, if ya don’t like it ignore it

On Topic:
What type of server and what revision? I can see this going far as long as you guys aren’t like the little story I posted above. Almost perfect grammar, only thing ya need is an actual domain and your well on your way! Good luck!

Read full topic
